definition: to wait for/to expect/to keep watch/to watch over/to nurse
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
sentences.chinese: 我已派了一個巡官和兩個警官守候在前門那裏。

sentences.english: My spirit and soul, keep waiting in your heart the door.
sentences.chinese: 我的靈和魂魄，不停守候在妳心門口。

sentences.english: Grace is still on the watch for the red- haired boy.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾絲仍在守候着那紅頭髮的男孩。

sentences.english: As told me recover spirit, waiting for a long time the rain in July.
sentences.chinese: 好像在告誡我恢復心神，去守候七月一場久違的雨景。

sentences.english: Waiting for a meal, a moray eel hides in a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 一條海鱔靜靜地在海綿中守候獵物自己上門。

sentences.english: I am waiting for the millennium faint hearts of evil creature.
sentences.chinese: 幽幽千年的守候是我心底的孽障。

sentences.english: A few people stood inside the waiting area, some of them crying. iReport.com
sentences.chinese: 僅有幾人站在候診區守候，其中有人在哭泣。

sentences.english: They waited for thousands of years of Bian Hua, but have never met.
sentences.chinese: 他們守候了幾千年的彼岸花，可是從來沒有見過面。

sentences.english: Who keep long vigils by the silent dust, and weep.
sentences.chinese: 在落下的塵埃前久久守候，哭泣。

sentences.english: There is a love, knowing it will have to wait for the silly, but lonely alone.
sentences.chinese: 有一種愛明知道要守候，卻傻傻的獨自寥寂。

sentences.english: The mother sat up all night with the sick child.
sentences.chinese: 母親徹夜不眠守候着那生病的孩子。

sentences.english: Who could taste the warmhearted feelings of watching for the little corner?
sentences.chinese: 誰又能體會到平平淡淡地守候着這個角落的溫情呢？

sentences.english: People are camped outside the police station at night.
sentences.chinese: 民衆夜間在警察局外紮營守候。

sentences.english: While waiting everyone moved to the other corner.
sentences.chinese: 在守候的功夫，全豹人移去了另一個角落等他。

sentences.english: I and all the other people who worked with Yaobang were worrying for him.
sentences.chinese: 我和耀邦同志身邊的工作人員一直守候着他。

sentences.english: And, there you wait for new instructions.
sentences.chinese: 在那處守候神給你新的指引。

definition: to stand for a long time
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to accompany sb/to accompany each other
to fight bravely/(fig.) to struggle/to work hard
